languages.text: "Это попрание всех священных устоев {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Империума{/g}. Я не знаю, {name}, чем продиктовано это... это самодурство... но я обещаю тебе: Янус ждут самые серьезные последствия".

"This is a gross violation of every sacred covenant of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. I do not know, {name}, what dictates this... this wilfulness... but I promise you: Janus will face the most serious consequences."
languages.original_text: "Это попрание всех священных устоев {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Империума{/g}. Я не знаю, {name}, чем продиктовано это... это самодурство... но я обещаю тебе: Янус ждут самые серьезные последствия".

traits.locale_text: "This is a gross violation of every sacred covenant of the Imperium. I do not know, {name}, what dictates this... this willfulness... but I promise you: Janus will face the most serious consequences."

"This is a gross violation of every sacred covenant of the Imperium. I do not know, {name}, what dictates this... this willfulness... but I promise you: Janus will face the most serious consequences."

"This is a gross violation of every sacred covenant of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. I do not know, {name}, what dictates this... this wilfulness... but I promise you: Janus will face the most serious consequences."

languages.text: “这严重违反了{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}的每一条神圣契约。{name}，我不清楚是什么原因让你做出了这样的决定……做出这种轻率之举……但我可以向你保证，加努斯将会面临最为严重的后果。”
languages.original_text: "This is a gross violation of every sacred covenant of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. I do not know, {name}, what dictates this... this wilfulness... but I promise you: Janus will face the most serious consequences."

traits.locale_text: “这严重违反了{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}的每一条神圣契约。{name}，我不清楚是什么原因让你做出了这样的决定……做出这种轻率之举……但我可以向你保证，加努斯将会面临最为严重的后果。”

languages.text: 「これは{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}との神聖な盟約すべてに著しく違反しています。{name}さん、このような…このような勝手を…誰の命令でしているのでしょうか。進言いたしますが、ヤヌスはかつてない重大な結果に直面することになるでしょう」
languages.original_text: "This is a gross violation of every sacred covenant of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. I do not know, {name}, what dictates this... this wilfulness... but I promise you: Janus will face the most serious consequences."

traits.locale_text: 「これは{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}との神聖な盟約すべてに著しく違反しています。{name}さん、このような…このような勝手を…誰の命令でしているのでしょうか。進言いたしますが、ヤヌスはかつてない重大な結果に直面することになるでしょう」

languages.text: "Das ist ein grober Verstoß gegen jedes heilige Abkommen des {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperiums{/g}. Ich weiß nicht, {name}, woher diese ... Vorsätzlichkeit kommt ... aber ich verspreche Euch: Das wird schwerste Konsequenzen für Janus haben."
languages.original_text: "This is a gross violation of every sacred covenant of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. I do not know, {name}, what dictates this... this wilfulness... but I promise you: Janus will face the most serious consequences."

traits.locale_text: "Das ist ein grober Verstoß gegen jedes heilige Abkommen des {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperiums{/g}. Ich weiß nicht, {name}, woher diese ... Vorsätzlichkeit kommt ... aber ich verspreche Euch: Das wird schwerste Konsequenzen für Janus haben."

languages.text: « Il s'agit d'une violation flagrante de toutes les conventions sacrées de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. J'ignore ce qui provoque cette... intention, {name}, mais je peux vous garantir que c'est Janus qui en subira les plus graves conséquences. »
languages.original_text: "This is a gross violation of every sacred covenant of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. I do not know, {name}, what dictates this... this wilfulness... but I promise you: Janus will face the most serious consequences."

traits.locale_text: « Il s'agit d'une violation flagrante de toutes les conventions sacrées de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. J'ignore ce qui provoque cette... intention, {name}, mais je peux vous garantir que c'est Janus qui en subira les plus graves conséquences. »

languages.text: «Esto es una violación obscena de todos los credos sagrados del {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. {name}, desconozco qué motiva este... este optimismo... pero le aseguro que Janus sufrirá unas consecuencias terribles por él».
languages.original_text: "This is a gross violation of every sacred covenant of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. I do not know, {name}, what dictates this... this wilfulness... but I promise you: Janus will face the most serious consequences."

traits.locale_text: «Esto es una violación obscena de todos los credos sagrados del {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. {name}, desconozco qué motiva este... este optimismo... pero le aseguro que Janus sufrirá unas consecuencias terribles por él».

languages.text: "{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}İmparatorluk'un{/g} tüm kutsal antlarını kaba bir şekilde çiğnemiş olduk. {name}, bu inatçılık nereden çıktı bilmiyorum ama sana şunun garantisini verebilirim: Janus, bunun bedelini çok ağır öder."
languages.original_text: "This is a gross violation of every sacred covenant of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. I do not know, {name}, what dictates this... this wilfulness... but I promise you: Janus will face the most serious consequences."

traits.locale_text: "{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}İmparatorluk{/g}'un tüm kutsal antlarını kaba bir şekilde çiğnemiş olduk. {name}, bu inatçılık nereden çıktı bilmiyorum ama sana şunun garantisini verebilirim: Janus, bunun bedelini çok ağır öder."
